# ![Visual Studio Code logomark] [Visual Studio Code]

This directory is for the configuration regarding the [Visual Studio Code] IDE editor.

[visual studio code logomark]: https://api.iconify.design/simple-icons/visualstudiocode.svg?color=%2394f
[visual studio code]: https://code.visualstudio.com/

## üìÇ Directory structure

| Path                          | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚öôÔ∏è [extensions.json](./extensions.json) | A configuration file to list extensions recommendations for this project workspace. [Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/extension-marketplace#_workspace-recommended-extensions) |
| ‚öôÔ∏è [settings.json](./settings.json) | A configuration file for all of the workspace settings. [Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/settings) |
| ‚öôÔ∏è [terminal-nerd.code-workspace](./terminal-nerd.code-workspace) | A configuration file to set up the workspace inside the editor. [Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/workspaces) |
